7"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"parameters":[{"id":"4c826b63-e082-46f1-ab1b-8a1a995c4587","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Logs","type":10,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[]},"jsonData":"[ | where Category == 'AzureFirewallNetworkRule' or Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where ResourceId != ""
| distinct ResourceId","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"selectAllValue":"*","showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","defaultValue":"value::all","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","value":["value::all"]},{"id":"da9832dc-0547-484b-b64f-63f6a232f4ac","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"NSGs","type":5,"isRequired":true,"multiSelect":true,"quote":"'","delimiter":",","query":"AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where NSGList_s != ""
| distinct NSGList_s
| extend flowsplit = split(NSGList_s, '/')
| extend nsgs = strcat('/subscriptions/', flowsplit[0], '/resourcegroups/', flowsplit[1], '/providers/microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups/', flowsplit[2])
| project nsgs","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"selectAllValue":"","showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":2419200000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","defaultValue":"value::all","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","value":["value::all"]}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"netRules"},"name":"parameters - 14"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"af68cebc-4ae8-463d-a232-758cb52a2401","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Action_var","label":"Firewall Action","type":10,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[

]"},{"id":"59cd6784-c3c2-4cee-99dd-e1e080f867a3","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"nsg_action","label":"NSG Action","type":10,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[

{
    "label": "All",
    "value": ["A'", "'D"],
    "selected": true
},
{
    "label": "Allow",
    "value": "A"
},
{
    "label": "Deny",
    "value": "D"
}
]"},{"id":"9bdbaa71-8bdf-460d-8d7e-2d10af5003cd","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"NSGFlowType","label":"NSG Flow Type","type":10,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[
    {
        "label": "All",
        "value": ["IntraVNet'", "'AzurePublic'", "'ExternalPublic"],
        "selected": true
    },

        "value": "IntraVNet"
    },

        "label": "Azure Public",
        "value": "AzurePublic"
    },
    {
        "label": "External Public",
        "value": "ExternalPublic"
    }
]"}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"netRules"},"name":"parameters - 3"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"aa3bcb45-71fa-4493-8d9b-33517bbf2bd0","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Protocol","type":10,"isRequired":true,"value":"All","typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[]},"jsonData":"[ 
"All", "TCP", "UDP", "ICMP"
]"},{"id":"6f1e38d6-cbdf-45a2-afb9-d9d9452fc39b","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Source_IP","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":""},{"id":"0123b1b2-4569-496b-9ab7-7c844b004ca9","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Destination_IP","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":""},{"id":"b2cd6b69-0f58-4e60-b340-29ff9a947761","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Destination_Port","type":1,"value":"","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"netRules"},"name":"parameters - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let NSGSearch = AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK"
| where Category == 'NetworkSecurityGroupEvent'
| where ResourceId has_any({NSGs})
| extend nsgs = split(tolower(ResourceId), '/')
| extend mynsg = strcat(nsgs[2], '/', nsgs[4], '/', nsgs[8])
| project mynsg;
// Start AZFWSearch
let FirewallLogs = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where ResourceId has_any({Firewalls}) or ResourceId != {Firewalls}
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from" SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt: int " to" TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt: int *
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a
| parse msg_s with * " was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from" SourceIP2 " to" TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S), SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt), TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "", Action2, Action1b), Action1a), Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol), SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP), TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP), SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort), TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort), NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
| where '*' == TargetPort or '*' == "*"
| where "*" == Action or "*" == "*"
| where '*' == NatDestination or '*' == "*"
| where SourceHost contains '{Source_IP}'
| where DestinationHost contains '{Destination_IP}'
| where DestinationPort startswith '{Destination_Port}'
| where Action has_any ('{Action_var}')
| extend Protocol_var = case('{Protocol}' == "TCP", "TCP", '{Protocol}' == "UDP", "UDP", '{Protocol}' == "All", "", '{Protocol}' == "ICMP", "ICMP", "")
| where Protocol contains Protocol_var
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, Action, SourceHost, DestinationHost, DestinationPort, ResourceId;
// -------- Private IP NSG Logs
/// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
let NSGLogs = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where NSGList_s has_any(NSGSearch)
| extend SourceHost=SrcIP_s
| extend DestinationHost=DestIP_s
| extend NSGRuleAction =tostring(split(NSGRules_s, '|', 3)[0])
| extend NSGRuleName=tostring(split(NSGRules_s, '|', 1)[0])
| extend NSGName=tostring(split(NSGList_s, '/', 2)[0])
| where "'D','A'" has NSGRuleAction
| where DestinationHost has ""
| where FlowType_s has_any('{NSGFlowType}')
| extend Protocol = case(L4Protocol_s == "T", "TCP", L4Protocol_s  == "U", "UDP", "")
| extend Protocol_var = case('{Protocol}' == "TCP", "T", '{Protocol}' == "UDP", "U", '{Protocol}' == "All", "", '{Protocol}' == "ICMP", "None", ""  )
| extend Action = case(NSGRuleAction == "D", "Deny",  NSGRuleAction == "A", "Allow", "")
| extend DestinationPort = split(tostring(DestPort_d), ".")[0]
| extend ResourceId = split(NSGList_s, "/")
| extend ResourceId = strcat("/subscriptions/", ResourceId[0], "/resourceGroups/", ResourceId[1], "/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/", ResourceId[2])
| where SourceHost contains '{Source_IP}'
| where DestinationHost contains '{Destination_IP}'
| where DestinationHost != ''
| where DestinationPort startswith '{Destination_Port}'
| where NSGRuleAction has_any ('{nsg_action}')
| where L4Protocol_s contains Protocol_var
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, Action, SourceHost, DestinationHost, tostring(DestinationPort), ResourceId;
// -------- Public IP NSG Logs 
/// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
let NSGPubLogs = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where NSGList_s has_any(NSGSearch)
| extend SourceHost=SrcIP_s
| extend DestinationHost=DestIP_s
| extend NSGRuleAction =tostring(split(NSGRules_s, '|', 3)[0])
| extend NSGRuleName=tostring(split(NSGRules_s, '|', 1)[0])
| extend NSGName=tostring(split(NSGList_s, '/', 2)[0])
| where "'D','A'" has NSGRuleAction
| where DestinationHost has ""
| where FlowType_s has_any('{NSGFlowType}')
| extend Protocol = case(L4Protocol_s == "T", "TCP", L4Protocol_s  == "U", "UDP", "")
| extend Protocol_var = case('{Protocol}' == "TCP", "T", '{Protocol}' == "UDP", "U", '{Protocol}' == "All", "", '{Protocol}' == "ICMP", "None", ""  )
| extend Action = case(NSGRuleAction == "D", "Deny",  NSGRuleAction == "A", "Allow", "")
| extend DestinationPort = split(tostring(DestPort_d), ".")[0]
| extend ResourceId = split(NSGList_s, "/")
| extend ResourceId = strcat("/subscriptions/", ResourceId[0], "/resourceGroups/", ResourceId[1], "/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/", ResourceId[2])
| where SourceHost contains '{Source_IP}'
| where DestinationPort startswith '{Destination_Port}'
| where NSGRuleAction has_any ('{nsg_action}')
| where L4Protocol_s contains Protocol_var
| extend PublicIP = split(DestPublicIPs_s, '|')
| mv-expand PublicIP
| where PublicIP has '.'
| extend PublicIP = trim(@"\d+ ", tostring(PublicIP))
| extend DestinationHost = case(DestinationHost == '', PublicIP, DestinationHost)
| where DestinationHost contains '{Destination_IP}'
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, Action, SourceHost, DestinationHost, tostring(DestinationPort), ResourceId;
/// Combine Firewall and NSG Logs
/// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
union {Logs}
| summarize by TimeGenerated, Protocol, Action, SourceHost, DestinationHost, tostring(DestinationPort), ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated","size":0,"noDataMessageStyle":5,"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showRefreshButton":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Action","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Allow","representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Deny","representation":"disabled","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Inspect","representation":"info","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"startsWith","thresholdValue":"drop","representation":"disabled","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"startsWith","thresholdValue":"alert","representation":"warning","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"more","text":"{0}{1}"}]}}],"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"SourceHost","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"SourceHost","sortOrder":1}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"netRules"},"name":"Firewall Deny"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"fcaaf5dc-3757-40f7-8399-1761e08a7a7d","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"app_Action","label":"Action","type":10,"isRequired":true,"value":"Allow","typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"["Allow", "Deny"]","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"appRules"},"name":"parameters - 12"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"f56e1291-1197-4af1-995d-c53c5b415584","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"app_source_ip","label":"Source_IP","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}},{"id":"f1c43039-1532-47cb-823f-6fe6d18e8a1f","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Destination_Host","type":1,"value":"","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}},{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Destination_URL","type":1,"value":"","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"id":"a9c6e639-c793-42a9-849d-804d6c3574ad"}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"appRules"},"name":"parameters - 10"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where ResourceId has_any({Firewalls}) or ResourceId != {Firewalls}
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt: int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt: int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S), SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied", "Deny", "Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "", Action1, Action2), Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "", case(Rule2b == "", " default action", Rule2b), Rule1), Rule2a), RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "", case(RuleCollection2a == "", "No rule matched", RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b), FQDN = case(FQDN == "", " default action", FQDN), TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", " default action", TargetPort)
| where '*' == SourceIP or '*' == "*" 
| parse Rule with WebAllow " Web Categories. Web Category:" WebCat
| extend WebCategory = case(WebCat == "", "N/A", WebCat)
| extend MyAction = case(Action == "Deny", case(Action == "Allow", case(WebAllow == "Allowed", case(WebAllow == "", "Deny", "Unknown"), Action), Action), "Allow")
| extend Action = MyAction
| parse DestinationPort with webPort ". Url: " URL
| extend myPort = case(webPort == "", TargetPort, webPort)
| extend DestinationPort = myPort
| where Action startswith '{app_Action}'
| where SourceHost contains '{app_source_ip}'
| where DestinationHost contains '{Destination_Host}'
| where URL contains '{Destination_URL}'
| summarize by TimeGenerated, Protocol, Action, SourceHost, DestinationHost, DestinationPort, URL, Rule, ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated","size":0,"noDataMessageStyle":5,"timeContext":{"durationMs":3600000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showRefreshButton":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"appRules"},"name":"Firewall Deny - Copy"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"parameters":[{"id":"3db7bc43-10ab-4b1d-a224-532f3c45a387","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"appgw_Source","label":"SourceIp","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":""},{"id":"6961d748-fb79-4c1b-a4fd-eb981aa62050","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Path","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":""},{"id":"efa5b3ee-db73-4578-812f-82cd0b5b1053","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Message","type":1,"value":"","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"label":"Message / Request"},{"id":"d422437f-b2c4-4db1-aa89-165bfb70e498","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"App_GW","label":"Application Gateway","type":5,"isRequired":true,"multiSelect":true,"quote":"'","delimiter":",","query":"AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK" and Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog" or Category == "ApplicationGatewayAccessLog"
| distinct ResourceId","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"defaultValue":"value::all","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isNotEqualTo","value":"netRules"},{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isNotEqualTo","value":"appRules"}],"name":"parameters - 12"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK" and Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| extend SourceIp = clientIp_s
| extend Path = requestUri_s
| extend Policy = policyId_s
| extend RuleType = ruleSetType_s
| where clientIp_s startswith '{appgw_Source}'
| where requestUri_s contains '{Path}'
| where Message contains '{Message}'
| where ResourceId has_any({App_GW})
| project TimeGenerated, Policy, RuleType, Message, Path, SourceIp, ResourceId","size":0,"timeContext":{"durationMs":3600000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"appGwWAFrules"},"name":"query - 11"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK" and Category == "ApplicationGatewayAccessLog"
| extend SourceIp = clientIP_s
| extend Path = requestUri_s
| extend Rule = ruleName_s
| extend Method = httpMethod_s
| extend Request = requestQuery_s
| extend Status = httpStatus_d
| where clientIP_s startswith '{appgw_Source}'
| where requestUri_s contains '{Path}'
| where requestQuery_s contains '{Message}'
| where ResourceId has_any({App_GW})
| project TimeGenerated, Rule, Method, Status, Path, Request, SourceIp, ResourceId","size":0,"timeContext":{"durationMs":3600000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogWorkspaces}"]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"tabFocus","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"appGwRules"},"name":"query - 13"}],"isLocked":true,"fallbackResourceIds":["/<yourLAWid>"]}
